flow_contents: How to use the project goes here.
achievement_title_dcon: National College of Technology Deep Learning Contest 2024 (DCON2024) 3rd Place
achievement_text_dcon: In May 2024, our project took 3rd place at the DCON2024 finals.
DCON is a competition where participants propose business plans using deep learning technology and compete on company valuation.
Following technical reviews and final presentations judged by active investors, our work was valued at 350 million yen.
achievement_title_jes: 45th Kyushu Okinawa Chapter of the Japanese Society of Human Engineering Award
achievement_text_jes: We presented at the 45th Kyushu Okinawa Chapter of the Japanese Society of Human Engineering and received an Excellence Presentation Award.

team_contents: We are a student team from Oita National College of Technology, developing the AI pillow ‚ÄúFAIP.‚Äù
**Our goal is to utilize AI technology to transform sleep in Japan.**
